name: Cardinal Health, Inc.
description: Cardinal Health, Inc. is a global, integrated healthcare services and products company that helps improve the cost-effectiveness of healthcare. Founded in 1971 and headquartered in Dublin, Ohio, Cardinal Health operates in two primary segments: Pharmaceutical and Medical. The Pharmaceutical segment distributes branded and generic pharmaceuticals, as well as provides pharmacy management services for hospitals and health systems. The Medical segment offers a range of medical products, including surgical and examination supplies, as well as equipment and services for healthcare facilities. Cardinal Health is committed to delivering innovative solutions that enhance healthcare delivery and improve patient outcomes. The company plays a vital role in the healthcare supply chain, partnering with manufacturers, healthcare providers, and patients. Through its advanced analytics and technology solutions, Cardinal Health is working to drive efficiencies and reduce costs, ultimately supporting the goal of delivering high-quality care. With a focus on sustainability, Cardinal Health also engages in various initiatives aimed at reducing waste and improving environmental impact across its operations.

seo.meta_title: Cardinal Health, Inc. | Integrated Healthcare Services and Products
seo.meta_description: Explore Cardinal Health, Inc., a leading provider of healthcare services and products, committed to improving the cost-effectiveness of healthcare. Learn about our innovative solutions and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does Cardinal Health do?
faq.answer: Cardinal Health provides healthcare services and products, including pharmaceutical distribution and medical products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Cardinal Health?
faq.answer: Mike Kaufmann is the CEO of Cardinal Health, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Cardinal Health headquartered?
faq.answer: Cardinal Health is headquartered in Dublin, Ohio, USA.

faq.question: What are Cardinal Health's main product categories?
faq.answer: Cardinal Health's main product categories include Pharmaceuticals and Medical Products.
